Contributing¶

Installation¶

  1. Clone repo: git clone git@github.com:Reyes2777/django_leader.git

  2. Install requirements: pip install -r requirements.txt

  3. Create .env_server file with the following variables:

    • DEFAULT_DB_NAME=leader_django

    • DEFAULT_DB_HOST=localhost

    • DEFAULT_DB_HOST_PORT=5432

    • DEFAULT_DB_USER=guest

    • DEFAULT_DB_PASSWORD=guest

  4. Enable precommit: pre-commit install

Testing¶

Run all tests with pytest -s -vvvv. For more uses of pytest, check this.

Alternatively you can run sh run_tests.sh

leader_django
